meta.title: CASA System & Sperm Analyzer | iSperm Medical
meta.description: Fully automated CASA systems & sperm morphology analyzers for human & veterinary use. WHO 6th edition compliant. Leading semen analyzer manufacturer.

hero.title: Revolutionizing Semen Analysis
hero.subtitle: Pioneering the Future of CASA Automation
hero.description: Fully automated CASA systems for human and veterinary semen analysis

about.title: About iSperm Medical
about.tagline: Pioneering the Future of Reproductive Diagnostics
about.description: Since 2010, iSperm Medical has been at the forefront of semen analysis research. As the first company to introduce fully automated CASA systems to the Chinese market, we are dedicated to transforming fertility diagnostics through precision and technology.
about.description2: From our groundbreaking clinical solutions to our industry-leading SQA-6100vet, we combine AI-driven algorithms with microfluidics to deliver laboratory-grade accuracy to professionals worldwide.

heroImage.alt: iSperm Medical - Leading CASA system and sperm quality analyzer manufacturer for reproductive diagnostics

features.title: Scientific Innovation
features.subtitle: Pioneering the Future of Reproductive Diagnostics

automated.title: Standardized Workflow
automated.description: Achieve full-process automation from loading to reporting. Our systems eliminate subjective bias, ensuring clinical consistency and maximizing laboratory throughput.

aiPowered.title: Intelligent AI Recognition
aiPowered.description: Powered by Gaussian dynamic AI algorithms, iSperm delivers high-precision morphological and kinematic tracking, identifying subtle anomalies with unprecedented diagnostic accuracy.

standalone.title: Integrated Versatility
standalone.description: A clinical-grade, all-in-one architecture featuring a built-in thermal stage and intuitive touchscreen. Engineered for seamless performance in both high-end labs and demanding field environments.

comprehensive.title: Advanced Analytics
comprehensive.description: Full-spectrum diagnostic parameters including concentration, multi-class motility, and WHO 6th edition morphology, providing a complete profile of reproductive health.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: A Legacy of Innovation
timeline.2010: Established with a focus on pioneering CASA research in China.
timeline.2016: Developed China's first home-use CASA system, bringing advanced diagnostics to the consumer level.
timeline.2017: Launched the first fully automated professional CASA system in China.
timeline.today: Our flagship CASA series (Nexus Dx1 / SQA-6100vet) serves as the trusted choice for automated reproductive assessment across the globe.

footer.description: iSperm Medical Ltd. is committed to delivering cutting-edge technology solutions in semen analysis.
footer.fullAddress: 2F, Block B, Shenchengtou & Zhongcheng Life Science Park, Pingshan District, Shenzhen, Guangdong, China
